CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 20, 1953, page 23, reads: "Steady Stream - Exhibitors sample and explain their wonderful products to the many housewives who filed past their booths during each of the four sessions."
TitMainTitle: Women, including one wearing striped dress near center, gathered in front of Crayton's, Mansfield Cole, Goode Pharmacy, Rieck's Dairy, and Tumpson & Co. booths, in Ammon Center for 1953 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
CatSubject_tab: Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair.Ammon Center (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Trade shows--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Gymnasiums--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Crowds--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
